研究发现转座子如何使用端粒来生存细菌转座子或“跳跃基因” - 可以从基因组的一个部分转移到另一部分的DNA片段 - 是细菌进化和抗生素耐药性发展的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-uncovers-how-transposons-use-telomeres-for-survival-survival-in-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/study-uncovers-how-transposons-use-telomeres-for-survival-survival-in-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d74E20E5-C6A2-4D4A-8483-43D6AA4003EB Fri, 07 Mar 2025 00:50:47 -0500 Study uncovers how transposons use telomeres for survival in bacteria
研究对抗癌药物如何攻击和破坏肿瘤细胞提出了新的解释UMass Chan医学院科学家Sharon Cantor博士和Jenna M. Whalen博士的研究为抗癌药物如何攻击和破坏BRCA1和BRCA2肿瘤细胞提供了新的解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/research-poses-a-a-new-epplanation-for-how-how-how-now-cancer-fighting-drugs-drugs-attack-and-tack-and-destroy-timor-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/research-poses-a-new-epplanation-for-how-how-how-now-cancer-fighting-drugs-drugs-attack-antack-and-destroy-timor-timor-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7E5C94CD-B5D5-47FE-90BD-975D9470961F Fri, 07 Mar 2025 00:35:00 -0500 Research poses a new explanation for how cancer-fighting drugs attack and destroy tumor cells
几天后，高脂饮食可能会导致老年人的记忆问题一项新的研究表明，只有几天的饱和脂肪饮食就足以引起记忆问题和老年人相关的脑部炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/high-fat-diet-could-cause-cause-memory-problems-in grod---- after-adults-after-after-just-just-a-few-days.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/high-fat-diet-could-cause-cause-memory-problems-in grod-after-after-after-after-just-just-a-few-days.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2CE4C32-5525-40A6-92CD-458E4E4ABD47D0 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 23:55:17 -0500 High-fat diet could cause memory problems in older adults after just a few days
定制的移动应用干预有益于老年人的认知能力下降越来越多的研究表明，在辅助生活设施中的老年人通过结合多种活动（例如改善饮食，解决难题和增加社交互动）的干预措施来延迟甚至可以防止认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/customized-mobile-mobile-app-intervention-benefits-benefits----- oderiencing-experiencing-mild-mild-nild-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/customized-mobile-mobile-app-intervention-benefits-benefits----- offits-adults-experiencing-mild-mild-nild-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A5447E6A-368A-4EA-4EA4-B667-BF33DC930C94 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 22:36:00 -0500 Customized mobile app intervention benefits older adults experiencing mild cognitive decline
新的大脑图技术可以识别容易受到阿尔茨海默氏病的细胞得克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校和加利福尼亚大学弗朗西斯科分校的研究人员使用了一种新的脑映射技术来识别与记忆相关的脑细胞容易受到蛋白质积累的影响，这是阿尔茨海默氏病发展的关键因素，这是一种无法治愈的，一种无法治愈的，渐进的脑部疾病，可以缓慢地摧毁记忆和思维技能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/new-brain-mapping-technique-indifies-cells-cells-vulners-to-vulnerable to-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/new-brain-mapping-technique-technique-indifies-cells-vulners-cells-vulners-to-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A22354f7-5815-4198-98-9F6D-71BD1828C3FE Thu, 06 Mar 2025 22:09:46 -0500 New brain mapping technique identifies cells vulnerable to Alzheimer's disease
部分腺体冷冻化为前列腺癌患者带来了长期成功一项五年的男性研究仅在前列腺中癌变的部分破坏了癌症，表明该手术在保留尿液和性功能的同时，该手术避免了大多数患者的癌症复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/partial-gland-cryoablation-oblation-long-term-term-term-success-for-prostate-prostate-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/partial-gland-cryoablation-offers-long-term-term-success-for prostate-prostate-cancerer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3541b972-2601-4009-4009-ac38-98b8af6e7ba4 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 21:52:09 -0500 Partial gland cryoablation offers long-term success for prostate cancer patients

研究发现妊娠矿物质水平与中年血压降低之间的联系根据美国心脏协会的流行病学和预防的研究，大约20年后，具有较高水平的必需矿物质的妇女，尤其是铜和锰的血液，尤其是铜和锰的血液循环，尤其是铜和锰的妇女，在中年患有高血压的风险较低。生活方式和心脏代谢健康科学会议2025。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/study-finds-link-bet-pregnancy-miner-levels-levels-and-lower--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/study-finds-link-bet-pregnancy-miner-levels-levels-and-levels-and-lower----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------lower-lower-balood-pressure-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC03A62A-AFB5-45A8-95DC-18F73353535AE8 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 21:43:31 -0500 Study finds link between pregnancy mineral levels and lower blood pressure in midlife
